column1: It appears by not sending the articles of impeachment over to the Senate early Pelosi is attempting to help Biden by keeping Sanders Warren and Klobuchar off the campaign trail at a critical time for their campaigns. They will be stuck in the Senate for the trial.

Should we now ask Democrat Presidential candidates whether they plan to side with the U.S. or the Iranians in the Middle East? Watching the current coverage in the media it appears to be a legitimate question. Should we allow Iran to kill Americans and not respond? I think not.
